h1. Prerequisites
{warning}
TO DO
{warning}

h1. Applications

h2. List of portlets

All the portlets are in social-portlet.war

h3. SocialBannerPortlet
h4. Description
Banner configured for Social, including Social logo and _change language_ link.
h4. Preferences
- name: _template_
- possible values: par:/groovy/social/portlet/UIBannerPortlet.gtmpl
- description: 

h4. Portlet.xml        

{code:xml}
<portlet>
    <description xml:lang="EN">Social Banner Portlet</description>
    <portlet-name>SocialBannerPortlet</portlet-name>
    <display-name xml:lang="EN">Social Banner Portlet</display-name>
    <portlet-class>org.exoplatform.webui.application.portlet.PortletApplicationController</portlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <name>webui.configuration</name>
      <value>/WEB-INF/conf/portlet/SocialBannerPortlet/webui/configuration.xml</value>
    </init-param>
    <expiration-cache>0</expiration-cache>
    <supports>
      <mime-type>text/html</mime-type>
    </supports>
    <supported-locale>en</supported-locale>
    <resource-bundle>locale.portlet.SocialBannerPortlet</resource-bundle>
    <portlet-info>
      <title>Social Banner Portlet</title>
      <short-title>Social Banner Portlet</short-title>
      <keywords>social</keywords>
    </portlet-info>
    <portlet-preferences>
      <preference>
        <name>template</name>
        <value>par:/groovy/social/portlet/UIBannerPortlet.gtmpl</value>
        <read-only>false</read-only>
      </preference>
    </portlet-preferences>
  </portlet>
{code}

h3. SpaceSettingPortlet
h4. Description
Shows the settings of Space: Settings, Visibility, Members, Application. You can change the setting information of a space if you are the creator of that space or have the manager right on it.
h4. Portlet.xml

{code:xml}
 <portlet>
    <description xml:lang="EN">Space Setting Portlet</description>
    <portlet-name>SpaceSettingPortlet</portlet-name>
    <display-name xml:lang="EN">Space Setting</display-name>
    <portlet-class>org.exoplatform.webui.application.portlet.PortletApplicationController</portlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <name>webui.configuration</name>
      <value>/WEB-INF/conf/portlet/SpaceSettingPortlet/webui/configuration.xml</value>
    </init-param>
    <expiration-cache>0</expiration-cache>
    <supports>
      <mime-type>text/html</mime-type>
      <portlet-mode>help</portlet-mode>
    </supports>
    <supported-locale>en</supported-locale>
    <resource-bundle>locale.portlet.SpaceSettingPortlet</resource-bundle>
    <portlet-info>
      <title>Space Setting</title>
      <short-title>Space Setting</short-title>
      <keywords>social</keywords>
    </portlet-info>
  </portlet>
{code}

h3. ConnectionsPortlet
h4. Description
The Conections page where you can access to your network, invitations to connect or connection requests
h4. Portlet.xml
{code:xml}
<portlet>
    <description xml:lang="EN">Connections Portlet</description>
    <portlet-name>ConnectionsPortlet</portlet-name>
    <display-name xml:lang="EN">Connections Portlet</display-name>
    <portlet-class>org.exoplatform.webui.application.portlet.PortletApplicationController</portlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <name>webui.configuration</name>
      <value>/WEB-INF/conf/portlet/ConnectionsPortlet/webui/configuration.xml</value>
    </init-param>
    <expiration-cache>0</expiration-cache>
    <supports>
      <mime-type>text/html</mime-type>
      <portlet-mode>help</portlet-mode>
    </supports>
    <supported-locale>en</supported-locale>
    <resource-bundle>locale.portlet.ConnectionsPortlet</resource-bundle>
    <portlet-info>
      <title>Connections Portlet</title>
      <short-title>Connections Portlet</short-title>
      <keywords>social</keywords>
    </portlet-info>
  </portlet>
{code}

h3. ProfilePortlet
h4. Description
h4. Preferences
- name: _template_
- possible values: app:/groovy/social/portlet/UIProfilePortlet.gtmpl
h4. Portlet.xml
{code:xml}
<portlet>
    <description xml:lang="EN">Profile Portlet</description>
    <portlet-name>ProfilePortlet</portlet-name>
    <display-name xml:lang="EN">Profile Portlet</display-name>
    <portlet-class>org.exoplatform.webui.application.portlet.PortletApplicationController</portlet-class>
    <init-param>
      <name>webui.configuration</name>
      <value>/WEB-INF/conf/portlet/ProfilePortlet/webui/configuration.xml</value>
    </init-param>
    <expiration-cache>0</expiration-cache>
    <supports>
      <mime-type>text/html</mime-type>
    </supports>
    <supported-locale>en</supported-locale>
    <resource-bundle>locale.portlet.ProfilePortlet</resource-bundle>
    <portlet-info>
      <title>Profile Portlet</title>
      <short-title>Profile Portlet</short-title>
      <keywords>social</keywords>
    </portlet-info>
    <portlet-preferences>
      <preference>
        <name>template</name>
        <value>app:/groovy/social/portlet/UIProfilePortlet.gtmpl</value>
        <read-only>false</read-only>
      </preference>
    </portlet-preferences>
  </portlet>
{code}

h2. List of Gadgets in Social
All Social portlets are in opensocial.war
h3. SocialHelloWorld
* *Description:* Gets all friends of owner and send 'Say Hello' to friend. 
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. Activities
* *Description:* Manages activities of users. Some kinds of activities such as: update status, like/unlike activities, comment activities, delete activities and delete comments. 
* *Description of preferences:* 
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. CodeSharer
* *Description:* Shares code and send shared code to http://codesharer.appspot.com/for sharing to friends for example or other. 
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. ApplicationList	
* *Description:* Gets information of all applications (portlet type) that is existing in Portal. This is gadget is used for demo rest service get application from portal container.  
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. ViewerFriends
* *Description:* Displays list viewer's friends of current user login.
* *Description of preferences:* Number of friend is viewed are 5 friends per page by default.
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. RSSFetch
* *Description:* Fetches and parses Rss information from specific url. 
* *Description of preferences:* Number of rss per page is 10 by default; Get rss from input url ( Default url is http://blog.exoplatform.org/feed/ ).
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. UserSpaces
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. CodeRunner
* *Description:* Opensocial developer gadgets. This is a good place to copy and paste code examples for experimenting with the OpenSocial API. 
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services*

h3. Clock
* *Description:* Digital Clock using for demo of applying I18n (change time when you change language of portal). 
* *Description of preferences:*
* *Links to used REST services:*

h3. MySpaces
* *Description:* Gets information of space that is my space and pending space of current user login. This gadget is used for demo using tab in writing gadget.
